name: postcss-active-view-transition-type

0.0.1.name: postcss-active-view-transition-type

scripts.test: npm run unit && eslint . && npx publint

0.0.1.description: PostCSS plugin that rewrites :active-view-transition-type(<type>) pseudo class selectors to :root.<type> selectors. To be used with mayStartViewTransition from @vtbag/utensil-drawer.
